long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on a thrilling puzzle adventure in Ball Escape, where your wit and agility are put to the ultimate test. Immerse yourself in a world of intricate mazes, cunning traps, and mind-bending challenges as you guide a ball through various obstacles to freedom.

Your mission is simple yet daunting: navigate through a series of increasingly complex levels, avoiding obstacles, hazards, and pitfalls to reach the exit. But don't be fooled by its simplicity; each level presents new challenges and requires quick reflexes, strategic planning, and precise control to succeed.
